user_query: I want to find trending website designs and templates, and also get tips and strategies for SEO to optimize my new business website.

TaskList.description: Research and gather trending website designs and templates relevant to my business type.
Compile a list of popular website design resources and platforms for templates.
Collect tips and strategies for search engine optimization (SEO) specifically tailored for new business websites.
Provide specific on-page and off-page SEO techniques to implement on the website.
